article_title: Speaker accused of 'party politics' over Gaza vote
sentence: Israel  launched  its  operations  in  Gaza  following  an  attack  by  Hamas  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  during  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  more  than  240  others  taken  hostage.

article_title: Speaker accused of 'party politics' over Gaza vote
sentence: Since  then,  Israel's  military  campaign  has  killed  more  than  29,000  people  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  Palestinian  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry,  whose  figures  are  accepted  by  the  United  Nations.
